HERO.Hero_body_1: We are a management quality & development consultancy for software development and technology work.
HERO.Hero_body_2: Let us help your company with your next project by offering consulting in Quality Assurance, Application Development or Project Management.
HERO.Hero_body_3: Let our team work on your next project through code development, media creation and more.

ABOUT.About_body_1: We are a new-aged management quality & development consultancy for software development and technology work.
ABOUT.About_body_2: Our services focus on providing our clients value and expertise through consulting, design and development work.
ABOUT.About_body_3: If you are looking for experienced Quality Assurance project and management expertise for a large project or a new startup / small business looking for someone to join their team offering multiple disciplines and knowledge in technology, projects & management, then you are who we want to work with.

FEATURES.Features_1_body_1: Offering years of quality and management experience and expertise to help your company move forward.
FEATURES.Features_1_body_2: With more than 25 years of financial industry expertise in large corporate environments, mid-sized service and retail industries, our consultants will be able to help navigate the unique challenges and requirements of your  next project.
FEATURES.Features_1_bullet_1: Experience with large, mid-sized & small organizations.
FEATURES.Features_1_bullet_2: Quality Assurance management & leadership for your next project.
FEATURES.Features_1_bullet_3: Business management consulting for your existing or start-up company.
FEATURES.Features_2_body_1: We can prepare designs and materials you'll need for your new or existing business, project or idea.
FEATURES.Features_2_body_2: Get us working for you on your next project:
FEATURES.Features_2_bullet_1: Your next website design or update project
FEATURES.Features_2_bullet_2: Ongoing website maintenance and deployment services
FEATURES.Features_3_body_1: Digital design and development services for your business to succeed and flourish.
FEATURES.Features_3_body_2: Our team has worked with many different development technologies and platforms:
FEATURES.Features_3_bullet_1: Web site development (HTML5, CSS, Javascript & Typescript)
FEATURES.Features_3_bullet_2: Android technologies & launches (Android studio, Kotlin & Java)
FEATURES.Features_3_bullet_3: iOS tecnologies (xCode, Swift and Swift UI)
FEATURES.Features_3_bullet_4: Web development platforms (Angular, Node JS, React, PHP)
FEATURES.Features_3_bullet_6: Data and databases (SQL, Firebase, MongoDB, Realm, Room)

CTA.Cta_body_p1: If you have a project role that you’re looking to fill,
CTA.Cta_body_p2: and fill out our contact sheet, telling us about the work and your needs.
